atrai.core

Class Pattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • atrai.core.Tree
      • atrai.core.Pattern

  • public class Pattern
extends Tree
    A specialized Tree for matching against other trees.
    Author:
    Koushik Sen, Alex Reinking

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public static Pattern parse(String source,
                            Lexer lexer)
        Create a Pattern from a string representing the pattern and a lexer for the string. These patterns use the following special symbols to construct trees:

        (% %) - matching pairs of these symbols group children of a tree \@ - a non-capture group \@_ - a capture group ` - backtick, escape next character

        Parameters:
        source - A string representing the pattern
        lexer - The lexer for patterns
        Returns:
        A new pattern tree

      • match

        public Object[] match(UntypedTree source)
        Convenience overload for matching against an untyped tree.
        Parameters:
        source - the tree to match against
        Returns:
        the captured matches

      • match

        public Object[] match(Object source)
        Matches the pattern against node or a leaf in an untyped tree. Sets the 0th capture to be the overall tree, then recurs to match other nodes.
        Parameters:
        source - The tree to match
        Returns:
        the captured matches

      • getMatches

        public Object[] getMatches()
        Returns the array of captures from the last call
        Returns:
        the array of captures from the last match or null if thet last match failed

      • getMatch

        public Object getMatch(int index)
        Returns the capture at index in the array of captures obtained during the last match
        Parameters:
        index - index of the capture to return
        Returns:
        object at index in the array of captures
